text: WHIZ-TV (channel 18) is a TV station in Zanesville, Ohio, United States. It is affiliated with NBC, Fox MyNetworkTV and MeTV. It is owned by Marquee Broadcasting alongside the company's only radio propertiesâ€”WHIZ (1240 AM), WHIZ-FM (92.7), and WZVL (103.7 FM). The stations share studios on Downard Road in Zanesville. WHIZ-TV's transmitter is also located at here. ==Newscasts NBC== === Weekdays === * 06:00-07:00 AM: WHIZ News - Sunrise * 12:00-12:30 PM: WHIZ News at Noon * 05:00-05:30 PM : WHIZ News at 5:00 * 06:00-06:30 PM: WHIZ News at 6:00 * 11:00-11:35 PM: WHIZ News at 11:00 === Weekends === * 11:00-11:35 PM: WHIZ News - LIVE at 11:00 ==Newscasts Fox== 10:00-10:30 PM: WHIZ News - LIVE at 10:00 on FOX 5 Zanesville Category:American television stations Category:Companies based in Ohio
title: WHIZ-TV
